projects.title: Product Team Lead, Engineering Management Case study simulation
projects.description:
Led a 6-member team to launch a mid-tier laptop from concept to production, Achieving a 15% reduction in lead time
Delivered the project 10% under budget and Managed product lifecycle across requirements, design, sourcing, and QA.
Developed a project plan in MS Project covering 5 major phases, tracking 30+ deliverables across a 16-week timeline

projects.title: Brand Audit, Fossil Watches
projects.description:
Conducted a brand audit and analyzed 100+ reviews, 3 competitors, and 5 equity pillars to identify brand perception gaps
Built a brand definition and mental map using 15 in-depth interviews and laddering to identify key value drivers
Proposed 10% price repositioning, refined digital strategy, and a Gen Z-focused engagement roadmap in a Strategic Report
